articles.content: Prabath Jayasuriya picked up his second ten-wicket haul in a Test match to lead Sri Lanka to an innings win over Ireland in Galle in the first Test.Unbeaten hundreds from Dinesh Chandimal and Sadeera… [+2911 chars]

articles.title: Jurgen Klopp has just unleashed his key player for 'new Liverpool' - Liverpool Echo
articles.description: Liverpool earned a 6-1 win against Leeds United in the Premier League with Trent Alexander-Arnold a standout star
articles.content:
Welcome to the new Liverpool. Pretty much the same as the old Liverpool, actually.
